name: Spark
description: Spark is a Career Exploration and Self-Discovery Program that gives middle school students opportunities to understand, experience and pursue what's possible for their future. We are leading The Possibility Movement by bringing together diverse communities of families, schools and companies who care, share, teach and inspire. whatTheyOffer: Spark is committed to creating opportunities specifically designed for students in the middle grades â€“ opportunities that forge the gap between what they are learning in the classroom and what they dream to accomplish later in life. They recognize the middle school years as a critical time of development for exploration, inspiration, and learning to help students stay connected to and fuel their dreams.
address: 25 Taylor Street, Suite 648, San Francisco, CA, 94102
